name: jate
description: A PWA text editor is designed to work offline and uses multiple methods to save data, ensuring reliability even if some browser features are unavailable. This ensures users can keep working without an internet connection.

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
